properties.typeLine: When this creature dies, put a -1 -1 counter on a creature
You may pay N N, if you do return this creature from the graveyard to play.
When this creature enters, mill 2 cards.
On enter, create a 2/2 ghoul Necros creature token
Lifelink. Evasive.
When a creature you control dies, drain 1 (each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life).
Undying (When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield with a -1-1 counter on it. Do this only when it has no -1-1 counter on it.)
At the beginning of your endstep, pay 4 life.
Exert - lose 1 life and add N
When this creature enters or attacks, you may sacrifice a creature. For each creature sacrificed this way put a +1 +1 counter on this creature, you draw a card and you lose 2 life.
While you have 10 or less life, this creature gains menace and +1 +1.
As this creature enters, you may pay 3 life and/or discard a card. If you paid life this way, it enters with lifelink if you discard a card this way it enters with undying.
Enters with a -1 -1 counter. When another creature dies you may add a -1 -1 counter to this creature. When this creature dies, move all -1 -1 counters from it to up to one other creature.
When this creature enters, you may sacrifice a creature, if you do destroy target creature or planeswalker.
Sacrifice a creature, pay 3 life: Transform this card >>> At the beggining of combat, choose one: Target creature gains menace until end of turn or put a -1 -1 counter on target creature.
When this creature dies choose creature, twine or Artefact. Each opponent sacrifices a permanent with the corresponding type.
Exert, pay 2 life: Draw a card.

Whenever this creature attacks, return target creature from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking. It is a necros zombie in addition to it's other types. Sacrifice it at the beggining of the next endstep.
Whenever you sacrifice a creature or pay life, create a 1/1 necros skeleton creature token.
Lifelink. Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies you may pay 2 life. If you do create a token of that creature except it's an necros undead ghoul in addition to it's other types and colors.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you have 10 or less life you may return target creature with mana value 5 or less from the graveyard to the battlefield. If you dont, instead create two 2/2 necros undead ghoul creature tokens.
Sacrifice a creature as a cost to cast this spell. Draw two cards.
Sacrifice a creature as a cost to cast this spell and pay 3 life. Add N N N.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to hand. It gains "this spell costs (1) less to cast".
Distribute up to two -1 -1 counters among creatures.
Pay X life. Each creature gets -X -X until end of turn, where X is the life you paid plus 1.
Pay 3 life. Look at the top 4 cards of your library. Put 2 into your graveyard and 2 into your hand.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
Pay 3 life. This costs (2) less if it targets a creature that costs 5 or less. Return target creature from your graveyard to play.
Return any number of creatures with total mana value 10 or less from any graveyard to the battlefield under your control. They are necros undead in addition to their other types and colors.
Entwine creature. When this enters, each player discards a card, sacrifices a creature and loses 3 life. Entwined creature gets +2 +2.
Entwine creature. Put a -1 -1 counter on Entwined crature at the beggining of each turn.
Entwine creature. At the beggining of your upkeep, the controller of Entwined creature loses 2 life.
Undead creatures you control get +1 +1.
You cannot lose the game by having less than 0 life. At the beggining of your upkeep discard a card and sacrifice a creature.
At the beggining of your first mainphase choose any number: Pay 1 life: Create a 1/1 necros creature token. Pay 2 life: draw a card. Pay 3 life: Add N.
Entwine player. At the beggining of Entwined players upkeep, you choose one: That player sacrifices a creature, that player discards a card, that player loses 4 life.
Exert, pay N, Sacrifice a creature: Gain 1 life and draw a card.
Augment creature. Augmented creature gets -1 -1. When augmented creature dies, draw a card.
When this creature enters the battleifld, scry 2.
On enter, look at target players hand.
When this creature enters the battlefield create an artefact scrap token.
Reflex. When this enters the battlefield, draw a card.
At the beggining of each upkeep, this creature gets +1 +1.
Artifact spells you cast cost (1) less to cast
Exert: Name a card type, then Reveal the top card of your library. if it's of the chosen type draw it.
On enter, Return target warp or artifact card that was put into your graveyard 3 or more turns ago to your hand. That card costs (1) less to cast.
On enter, target a creature. If you control that creature, it becomes an Artefact in addition to it's other types (this counts as modifed). Otherwise it instead loses it's other card types.
On enter, return target creature an opponent controls to their hand
On enter, target creature or artifact becomes a 3/3 Elementum ooze creature token. It loses all other colors, card types and abilities.
The first time you draw a card each turn, this creature gets +1 +1.
If you drew 4 or more cards this turn, transform. >>>  At the beggining of combat on your turn choose one: target creature gains evasive until end of turn or draw a card.
Gets +1 +1 for each Artefact you control. If it's power and toughness are 5 or more, it gains vigilance.
When this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card. Evasive.
When this creature enters you may choose a creature or Artefact in play, this creatures enters as a copy of the chosen permanent. If it's a creature, it has +1 +1.
Your upkeep happens one additional time immidiately after the first (this includes drawing cards).
If you would scry, scry that much plus 1. Whenever you scry 4 or more, draw a card.
This creature costs 1 less and gets +1 +1 for every two cards you've cast this game. Spells and abilities that target this cost (3) more to cast.
Entwine creature. Entwined creature gets "Whenever this deals combat damage to a player, draw a card"
Entwine creature or artifact. You control entwined creature or artifact.
Enters battlefield exerted. Exert: Add any one color of mana.
At the beggining of your turn, look at the top card of each players library. Exert, Sacrifice this: draw a card.
Exert, Pay E (1): Return target Artefact with mana value 4 or less from the graveyard to play.
Enters with 4 study counters. When it has no study counter, sacrifice it. Exert: Draw a card and remove a study counter from this.
(2) Exert: This artefact becomes a copy of another target creature or artefact you dont control until end of turn
All non-weave perments are artefacts in addition to their other types. Artefacts you control can gain reflex.
(X), Exert: Scry X. This costs 1 less for every two Elementum weaves you control.
Pay E or tap 2 other creatures/artefacts: This Artefact becomes a 4/4 construct creature until end of turn
Augment creature: Augmented creature gets +0 +1. It is also an Artefact.
Augment creature: Whenever you scry the second time each turn, put a +1 +1 counter on augmented creature. When augmented creature attacks, scry 1.
(1): Target Artefact becomes an exact copy of this Artefact. Exert: Add (1). Exert, (3): Create a 2/2 Artefact solider creature token.

Counter target Warp spell
Counter target creature spell. If it is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it it's owners graveyard. You may cast that spell from exile.
Scry 3, then draw 3 cards.
Search target opponents library for a creature card and Put it onto the battlefield under your control. They shuffle their library.
Draw 2 cards.
Look at the top 2 cards of target players spell library. Exile one of them, you may play that card as long as it remains exiled.

If you have 25 or more life, creatures you control get +1 +1.

Whenever this creature attacks or blocks, exile a card from a graveyard. Put a +1 +1 counter on this creature for each card exiled this way.
When this creature enters, search for a creature card with mana value 5 or greater, and put it into your hand.

Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, draw a card.

On enter, draw a card and gain 4 life.
Whenever a weave comes into play under your control gain 1 life and draw a card.
Whenever this attacks or blocks untap up to two weaves and tap up to two weaves an opponent controls.

Haste. Trample. On enter, give all creatures trample and +1 +1 until end of turn.
Trample. When this attacks or blocks, gain 3 life.
Trample. You may exert a creature to pay for (1). The first time this creature would be destroyed, ignore it.
Entwine creature. Entwined creature gains "whenever you gain life, put a +1 +1 counter on this creature".
On your upkeep, gain 2 life. If you have 25 or more life, draw a card.
Creatures you control get +1 +1.
Entwine creature: If entwined creature would die or be exiled this Twine is destroyed instead.
At the beggining of combat on your put a +1 +1 on a green creature you control. Then draw a card if you control a creature with 5 or more power or toughness.
At the beggining of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn create a 4/4 vitae treant creature token.
At the beginning of your endstep, untap all creatures you control and put a +1+1 counter on each of them.
At the beginning of each oppoenents upkeep, untap all weaves you control. At the end of each opponents end step tap all weaves they control.
Search your weave library for a weave, reveal it and put it onto the top of your thread library.
Search your weave library for a Vitae weave, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Choose a Permanent type. Look at the top three cards of your library, put each of the chosen type into your hand and the rest onto the bottom of your library.
Put a +1 +1 counter on target creature. Then target creature you control fights another target creature.
Exile up to 3 cards from graveyards. Add V for each card exiled this way.
Draw cards equal to the highest toughness or power among creatures you control.
All creatures you control gain "this creature cannot be destroyed" and +X +X, where X is the number of vitae weaves you control until end of turn.
whenever you cast a Twine, put a +1+1 counter on a creature you control.

Activated abilities of permanents can't be activated
Exert: Your next spell cost X less to cast, where X is the number of modified creatures you control when this resolves.
Spells and abilties your oppoents cast that target your Twine cost (2) more to cast. Whenever a spell or abilitity targets an Twine you control, scry 1.

properties.typeLine: Deal 2 damage to any target. Creatures you control get +1 +0 until end of turn.
